title: How to Draw Mr. Krabs from SpongeBob SquarePants

steps.title: Draw a small inverted cone shape.
steps.content: Draw a small inverted cone shape.

steps.title: Draw two long and thin protruding ovals for the eyes.
steps.content: Draw two long and thin protruding ovals for the eyes. Add 3 small ellipse shape on each eye for his eyelashes.

steps.title: Draw the wavy long nose and three bumps at the back of his head.
steps.content: Draw the wavy long nose and three bumps at the back of his head.

steps.title: Add details to the face like circular pupils on the eye and curve line for a smiling mouth.
steps.content: Add details to the face like circular pupils on the eye and curve line for a smiling mouth. Draw small details of his shirt like the collar and undershirt.

steps.title: Finalize your drawing and erase unnecessary lines.
steps.content: Finalize your drawing and erase unnecessary lines.

steps.title: Try drawing Mr Krabs’ other facial expressions.
steps.content: Try drawing Mr Krabs’ other facial expressions.

steps.title: Draw large inverted cone shape, this will be the body.
steps.content: Draw large inverted cone shape, this will be the body.

steps.title: Draw two circles at the left and right side of the body, this will be the hands.
steps.content: Draw two circles at the left and right side of the body, this will be the hands.

steps.title: Connect the hands and the body with thin arms bent at the middle.
steps.content: Connect the hands and the body with thin arms bent at the middle. Bellow the body draw two small "v" shapes for the feet.

steps.title: Add details to the face.
steps.content: Add details to the face. Draw the long eyes, long wavy nose, 3 bumps on the back of the head and curved line for the mouth.

steps.title: Draw Mr Krabs outfit.
steps.content: Draw Mr Krabs outfit. His shirt and pants with the belt.

steps.title: Draw the bumps on his crab hands using short curved strokes.
steps.content: Draw the bumps on his crab hands using short curved strokes.

steps.title: Finalize your drawing and erase unnecessary lines.
steps.content: Finalize your drawing and erase unnecessary lines.
